data.name: RPG Maker MZ - Meal Time Tileset - Modern edition
data.detailed_description:
Burp! Here comes the second entry of the food tileset packs! This time set in a modern setting!
It is simply not possible to build a convincing RPG game world without some satisfying meals on the table!

The pack contains a total of 128 types of “dishes” and "drinks", as well as "tableware" set in a modern environment! This includes items like ramen, curry, sushi, tempura, as well as fast food like burgers and fries!

Hmm, is that the sound of your game characters’ stomach growling, looking for some high-quality food tilesets?

*******************************************
Contents:
Food tile set, 1 sheet (128 types)

-Canned Juice x 4
-Bottled Juice x 4
-Bottled Milk x 4
-Cafe snacks x 8
-Cocktails x 8
-Alcohol x 8
-Japanese food x 4
-Fast food x 16
-Family restaurant x 9
-Sushi x 8
-Rice bowl x 4
-Noodles x 4
-Sweets x 15
-Bread x 8
-Izakaya (Japanese tavern) x 4
-Snacks x 4
-Tableware x 8
-Cookware x 4
-Table x 4
*******************************************
